name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior iOS Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I possess extensive knowledge in developing high-performance applications using **Swift**, **SwiftUI**, **Combine**, and **Swift Concurrency**. I am adept in employing architectural patterns such as **MVVM** and utilizing tools like **SPM** for seamless package management. My technical expertise encompasses **Kotlin**, **Compose**, **Coroutines**, and **Room**, enhancing my versatility in multi-platform development. Additionally, I have experience in employing **gRPC** for efficient communication between services. My proficiency extends to cloud technologies like **GCP**, **GKE**, and data management solutions including **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, enabling me to deliver robust back-end integrations. I bring exceptional leadership and communication skills to drive projects forward while adhering to industry best practices.
